antipatterns.name: Decorative role
antipatterns.description: Role assignment adds no behavioral constraint
antipatterns.example: You are a helpful, friendly AI assistant
antipatterns.fix: Replace with functional role that constrains domain, vocabulary, and output format

antipatterns.name: Vague output spec
antipatterns.description: Expected output format not explicitly specified
antipatterns.impact: Claude chooses length, format, depth arbitrarily
antipatterns.fix: Specify format, length, structure, and concrete success criteria

antipatterns.name: Contradictory instructions
antipatterns.example: Be concise AND Be thorough and comprehensive
antipatterns.impact: Claude oscillates or picks one arbitrarily
antipatterns.fix: Choose one, or scope them: 'Be concise in explanations, thorough in data coverage'

antipatterns.name: Missing uncertainty handling
antipatterns.description: No instruction for when input is ambiguous
antipatterns.impact: Claude guesses rather than flagging ambiguity
antipatterns.fix: Add: 'If the input is ambiguous, state your interpretation before proceeding'

antipatterns.name: Prose wall
antipatterns.description: Instructions buried in paragraphs of prose
antipatterns.impact: Claude misses instructions buried in prose

antipatterns.name: Hallucination prayer
antipatterns.description: Decorative accuracy request with no mechanism
antipatterns.fix: Replace with grounding: 'Base responses only on provided context. Cite sections. If info missing, say so'

antipatterns.name: Stateful assumption
antipatterns.example: Remember what I said earlier (in API system prompt)
antipatterns.impact: API calls are stateless, Claude has no memory
antipatterns.fix: Include all necessary context in every call

antipatterns.name: Implicit inference reliance
antipatterns.description: Prompt designed for Claude 3.x inference, underspecified
antipatterns.example: Relies on model 'reading between the lines'
antipatterns.impact: Claude 4.x is literal, produces underspecified outputs

antipatterns.name: Example pollution
antipatterns.example: Examples with filler phrases that Claude replicates
antipatterns.impact: Claude 4.x replicates example patterns including bad ones
antipatterns.fix: Audit examples for unwanted patterns, add 'do not replicate' note if needed

antipatterns.name: Sycophancy invitation
antipatterns.example: Please help me / I'd really appreciate
antipatterns.impact: Claude adds filler praise and excessive hedging
antipatterns.fix: Add: 'Do not include filler praise, hedging, or unnecessary caveats'

antipatterns.name: Missing negative constraints
antipatterns.description: Only positive instructions, no scope boundaries
antipatterns.impact: Claude doesn't know what's out of scope, may over-deliver
antipatterns.fix: Add 'Do not [specific out-of-scope actions]' for likely failure modes

antipatterns.name: Unreferenced context
antipatterns.description: Context block never referenced by instructions
antipatterns.example: Large context that no instruction uses
antipatterns.fix: Remove unused context or add instructions that reference it

antipatterns.name: Token bloat
antipatterns.impact: Wastes context window, increases latency and cost
antipatterns.fix: Cut to minimum viable instruction set

antipatterns.name: Missing verification step
antipatterns.impact: Errors in structured output go uncaught
antipatterns.fix: Add: 'Before returning, verify: [checklist of output requirements]'

antipatterns.name: Full file content sent (WFC)
antipatterns.description: Entire file content sent instead of file reference
antipatterns.impact: Violates WFC token management, wastes context
antipatterns.fix: Use file reference architecture: send file path + domain guidance

antipatterns.name: Missing TEAMCHARTER alignment (WFC)
antipatterns.description: No values alignment in task description
antipatterns.example: Task has no connection to TEAMCHARTER values
antipatterns.impact: Work not aligned with team values and principles
antipatterns.fix: Add values alignment: connect task to customer focus, innovation, etc.

antipatterns.name: Invalid Agent Skills frontmatter (WFC)
antipatterns.description: YAML frontmatter doesn't match Agent Skills spec
antipatterns.impact: Skill fails validation, doesn't load correctly
antipatterns.fix: Use only: name, description, license. Remove deprecated fields
